comment: Dekh tere reply se teri condition pta chal rahi....sulgaai hui thi kangna ne teri ?
amr:
# ::snt Dekh tere reply se teri condition pta chal rahi....sulgaai hui thi kangna ne teri ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / try-01
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (r / reply-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG2 (c / condition
                        :poss (c2 / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Taiwan"))
                        :ARG1-of (s / say-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Chal"
                                          :op2 "Rahi"))))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (h / hui
                  :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))
            :op2 (k / kangna
                  :polarity -
                  :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown)
                  :poss (y2 / you))))
